abstract: I recently purchased a Mac Mini and used the Boot Camp utility to partition the drive and install Windows XP. Is it necessary to install virus protection on the Windows partition?
snippet: I recently purchased a Mac Mini and used the Boot Camp utility to partition the drive and install Windows XP. Is it necessary to install virus protection on the Windows partition?
lead_paragraph: Q. I recently purchased a Mac Mini and used the Boot Camp utility to partition the drive and install Windows XP. Is it necessary to install virus protection on the Windows partition?
